infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Granting access will allow you to take photos and add them to attachment fields,add them to profile picture and share story with friends
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to upload pictures.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: If not allowed, you will be unable to share your location in chats or use location-based services. CetChat also uses this info to deliver relevant search results and to keep your account safe when resgitering or logging into CetChat.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: If not allowed, you will be unable to share your location in chats or use location-based services. CetChat also uses this info to deliver relevant search results and to keep your account safe when resgitering or logging into CetChat.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs access to your microphone to record audio.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to upload pictures.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This app needs access to your calendar to send calendar events.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: This app needs access to your reminders to send reminders.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This app needs access to your contacts to send contacts.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: This app needs access to your FaceID to unlock the app.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: This app needs access to your motion to send motion data.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: This app needs access to your health data to send health data.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: This app needs access to your health data to send health data.

infoPlist.NSHomeKitUsageDescription: This app needs access to your homekit to send homekit data.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: This app needs access to your bluetooth to send bluetooth data.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This app needs access to your bluetooth to send bluetooth data.
infoPlist.NSAppleEventsUsageDescription: This app needs access to your apple events to send apple events data.
infoPlist.NSSiriUsageDescription: This app needs access to your siri to send siri data.
infoPlist.NSVideoSubscriberAccountUsageDescription: This app needs access to your video subscriber account to send video subscriber account data.
infoPlist.NSMediaLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your media library to send media library data.
infoPlist.NSNFCReaderUsageDescription: This app needs access to your NFC to send NFC data.
infoPlist.NSCarPlayUsageDescription: This app needs access to your carplay to send carplay data.
infoPlist.NSHealthClinicalHealthRecordsShareUsageD: This app needs access to your health clinical health records to send health clinical health records data.
infoPlist.NSHealthClinicalHealthRecordsViewUsageDe: This app needs access to your health clinical health records to send health clinical health records data.
infoPlist.NSHealthCareUsageDescription: This app needs access to your health care to send health care data.
infoPlist.NSNetworkUsageDescription: This app needs access to your network to send network data.
infoPlist.NSPersonalVPNUsageDescription: This app needs access to your personal VPN to send personal VPN data.
infoPlist.NSVoiceTriggerUsageDescription: This app needs access to your voice trigger to send voice trigger data.
infoPlist.NSAirPlayUsageDescription: This app needs access to your airplay to send airplay data.
infoPlist.NSAirDropUsageDescription: This app needs access to your air drop to send air drop data.

infoPlist.NSLocationUsageDescription: If not allowed, you will be unable to share your location in chats or use location-based services.CetChat also uses this info to deliver relevant search results and to keep your account safe when resgitering or logging into CetChat.

plugins.photosPermission: CetChat needs access to your photos so you can select a profile picture
